author: rstickles@sympatico.ca
subject: Lupin in English v1.5
body:
AVAILABILITY OF LUPIN III IN ENGLISH version 1.5  (January 27,  2002)  

The purpose of this list is to show available and in progress English translations of the anime series Lupin III on video.  If multiple english versions of the film/special/episode exist then preference is given to versions subtitled by active fansubbing groups or to commercial versions that are currently in print.  It has come to my attention that Funimation has purchased the rights to produce english language versions of some of the more recent TV specials and theatrical films.  I'll add an appropriate entries for them when the particular titles are announced or released.  

If you have any additions or corrections to any of the information contained here please feel free to contact me at rstickles@sympatico.ca.  Please correct my romanji!

Lupin III is copyright (c) Tokyo Movie Shinsha

Key:
-------
SUB = subtitle
DUB = dub
INP = In progress
OOP= Out of Print

Fansubbers:
-------------
Dark Ops (no longer subtitling)
Lupin Gang Anime www.pond.com/~erik/lupingang/ (site is down)
Neko Creations
Nyanko House Productions
Odyssey Anime -- www.odysseyanime.com (will cease subtitling/distribution on January 31/2002)
Studio Banzai
Studio ESPer -- www.geocities.com/studioesper/
Saiya-jin Productions --soyokaze.biosci.ohio-state.edu/~gohan/html/sjp/sjpmain.html


1969 Pilot Film
-------------------
-original version of Pilot in cinemascope aspect ratio which went unused until 1978 where it was shown as a lead in to the first Theatrical film (Lupin nei Fukusei Ningen)
SUB Neko Creations as part of The Secret File

1970 Pilot Film
--------------------
-second version of Pilot, reshot in 4:3 aspect ratio with some minor differences in scene order, art, and voice cast.  This version was never shown in full but portions of the footage were used in the opening credits of the 1971 TV Series.
SUB Neko Creations as part of The Secret File

1971 Lupin Sansei (TV Series, 23 episodes)
---------------------------------------------------------
SUB Neko Creations eps 1-23
SUB Ureshi Anime  eps 7-8
- Neko's sub scripts for 1-4, 17-23 are publically available

1974 Lupin III: Stange Psycho-Kinetic Strategy (Nenriki Chin Sakusen)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INP Studio ESPper (awaiting translation)
INP DarkOps (defunct)
- live action film, was slated for fansub but that now seems very unlikely

1977 Shin Lupin Sansei (TV Series, 155 episodes)
-----------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Lupin Gang Anime eps 1-4, 66, 99, 103-106, 108
SUB BBGun Productions eps 145, 155
SUB SV2 eps 145, 155 
DUB Streamline Pictures VHS (OOP) eps 145 and 155 as two volumes of "Tales of the Wolf" and a combined volume "Lupin III's Greatest Capers" 
INP Lupin Gang Anime eps 5-8, 16, 67, 72, 148, 151
INP The Skaro Hunting Society eps 49-52, 69-72

1978 Mystery of Mamo/Secret of  Mamo/Lupin vs the Clone/Lupin vs the Immortal Man  (Lupin nei Fukusei Ningen/Mamoo no Ichihen ) 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
- originally titled "Lupin III" when released in Japan, the later titles were added to avoid confusion with subsequent films.  
DUB Streamline Pictures VHS (OOP), Image Entertainment DVD (Region 1, OOP), Toho LD (OOP, dub only and has second audio track with no voices -contains a dual language script book based on Streamline dub) 
DUB Manga UK VHS PAL TV format
DUB Tokyo Movie Shinsha?,  4:3 screen aspect that crops the picture (pan but no scan)
SUB Any *english* fansubbed versions of this exist? (I know of a Finnish sub)
INP Lupin Gang Anime (on hold)

1979 The Castle of Cagliostro (Cariosutoro no shiro)
---------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB/DUB Manga Ent. VHS/DVD (Region 1), sub script by Neil Nadelman
SUB/DUB Buena Vista Home Ent. DVD (Region 2), uses Streamline dub and Carl Macek's english script for subtitles (dubtitle)
DUB Streamline Ent. VHS (OOP), Toho LD (OOP, dub only and has second audio track with no voices -contains a dual language script book based on Streamline dub) 
SUB many fansubs exist from public scripts, most are now redundant to the commercial Manga sub and are not widely distributed

1982 Lupin VIII/Arsene and Company/Arsene et cie 
-------------------------------------------------------------------
- 6? episodes of a series (Japan and France coproduction, and possibly DiC in Canada?) aborted due to copyright issues between Leblanc estate and TMS.
INP ??? Pilot exists without vocal track which may have never been recorded.  Six episodes are rumored to have been animated but so far only the pilot has surfaced.

1984 Lupin III Part 3 (TV Series, 50 episodes)
-------------------------------------------------
SUB Lupin Gang Anime eps 2, 6, 9, 17

1985 Legend of Gold Babylon/Golden Legend of Babylon (Babiron no Ogon Densetzu)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB AnimEigo VHS/LD as "Rupan III"

1987 The Fuma Conspiracy/Plot of the Fuma Clan (Fuuma Ichizoku no Imboo)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB/DUB AnimEigo VHS as "Rupan III"
SUB AnimEigo LD as "Rupan III"
SUB Killer Nuts Anime (public script exists)

1988 Lupin III: The Secret File
----------------------------------------
SUB Neko Creations 
- LD collection of the two Pilot Films (see individual entries), theatrical trailers for Clone, Cagliostro, Babylon and Fuma (originally an OVA, later released theatrically), the opening/closing sequences for the three TV series, and the opening music sequence for Cagliostro (Fire Treasure).  Neko's sub contains only the Pilots and trailers.  Sub scripts are publically available.

1989 Goodbye Lady Liberty/Liberty Crisis/Bye Bye Liberty - Begin Emergency! (Bai Bai Ribatii - Kiki Ippatsu!)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DUB Manga Ent UK VHS (PAL TV format only)
SUB Studio Banzai (from J.N. Productions script)
SUB Nippon Golden Network (Hawaiian TV/KHML)/J.N. Productions

1990 Riddle of the Hemmingway Papers (Hemmingway Paper no Nazo)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB none known

1991 Race for Napolean's Dictionary (Napoleon no jisho wo Ubae)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Saiya-jin Productions

1992 From Russia with Love (Rosia Yori Ai O Komete)
------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Lupin Gang Anime
SUB Nyanko House Productions

1993 Orders to Assassinate Lupin/Dark Order of Assassination (Lupin Ansatsu Keikaku/Lupin Ansatu Shirei)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sub Odyssey Anime (v1)
SUB DarkOps (defunct)

1994 Mighty Sword that Cuts Steel/Zentesu Sword is on Fire (Moeyo Zantetsuken)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Odyssey Anime (v1)
SUB S. Baldric productions (professionally subbed bootleg)

1995 Die! Nostradamus/Go to Hell Nostradamus (Kutabare! Nostradames)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Odyssey Anime (v2)
SUB Neko Creations 

1995 Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure (Harimao no Hiho wo Oe)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Odyssey Anime (v4)
INP Lupin Gang Anime - timing

1996 Dead or Alive
-------------------------
SUB Lupin Gang Anime
SUB Odyssey Anime (v1)

1996 Legend of Twlight Gemini/Secret of Twilight Gemini (Towairaito Jemini no Himitsu)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Odyssey Anime (v3)
SUB Lupin Gang Anime
SUB Neko Creations 
- Neko's sub scripts are publically available

1997 In Memory of Walther P-38 
--------------------------------------------
SUB Lupin Gang Anime

1998 Memories of Blaze - Tokyo Crisis (Honoo no Kioku - Tokyo Crisis)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Lupin Gang Anime

1999 Fujiko's Unlucky Days - Da Capo of Love  (Ai no Da Capo - Fujiko's Unlucky Days)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUB Odyssey Anime (v1)
SUB Don Quixote (profesionally subbed bootleg)
INP Lupin Gang Anime

2000 1$ Money Wars
---------------------------

2001 The Alcatraz Connection
---------------------------
SUB none known

2002 Return of Pycal/Resurrection of the Magician (Ikiteita no Majutsushi)
---------------------------
